attributes.action: We call upon HM Government to honour the outcome of the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: We believe to introduce a ruling after a result with the express purpose to over rule that result would be undemocratic and not be in the interests of future democratically held referendums and pose possible challenges to future narrowly won Local and General Elections.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to honour the result of the EU referendum and carry out the wishes of the majority based on the votes cast and initiate Article 50 at the earliest opportunity.
